name: PUNNETT BROS: THE PUZZLES
description:
NOTE: These are the puzzles for the game Punnett Bros. They are not the game themselves, but rather, just puzzles that are available separately.

PUNNETT BROS: THE PUZZLES

You are probably here because you decided to play the highly educational game Punnett Bros, and you have passed the first two levels, that were quite easy. And on this very webpage, you have all of the three levels available as separate downloads!

Use the arrow keys to move the cursor, and the space key to drag and drop the options. If you happen to fail the level, press the R key.
